title: Why Trust Whiteboard Consultants For Your Australian Dream?
description: As the leading study in Australia consultants in Kolkata, we provide tailored guidance to ensure your academic journey down under is a success.

features.text: Expert guidance on the Genuine Student (GS) visa requirement.
In-depth knowledge of the Australian Qualifications Framework (AQF).
High success rate for Student visa (subclass 500) applications.
Personalized advice on scholarships and bursaries for Indian students.
Comprehensive test preparation for IELTS & TOEFL.
Support for OSHC, accommodation, and pre-departure.
Specialized advice on post-study work rights and regional benefits.

image.alt: A team of education consultants collaborating on study in Australia applications
